message: I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to purchase a high-value product for a competitive price. I believe it's a great deal for both of us. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18,000.

While I appreciate your offer, $18,000 is significantly higher than my budget. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for the product. This is a fair price considering the value you place on it, and allows both of us to benefit from the transaction.

I appreciate your willingness to make a counteroffer, but $10,000 is still below my minimum price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer you a compromise. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $14,000.

While I appreciate your willingness to compromise, $14,000 is still more than I'm comfortable spending.  I'm willing to go up to $12,000. This represents a significant investment for me, and I believe it's a fair price considering the value you've placed on the product.
